com.epam.training.dao.factory

Class AbstractDAOFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.training.dao.factory.AbstractDAOFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MySQLDAOFactory

    public abstract class AbstractDAOFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class AbstractDAOFactory contains abstract methods that should create DAO entities (such as MemberDAO, IssueDAO, ProjectDAO, BuildDAO, etc.). Specific implementations (i.e. specific variants of DAO objects that allow to work with a given database or data source) are presented by the sub-classes. The class also contains method that returns different types of DAOFactory sub-classes.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Vasili Andreev

      • getDAOFactory

        public static AbstractDAOFactory getDAOFactory(java.sql.Connection connection,
                               DAOFactoryType factoryType)

        Parameters:
        factoryType - the type of DAOFactory
        connection - java.sql.Connection
        Returns:
        The instance of DAOFactory (a sub-class of AbstractDAOFactory)
